task_description: 为吼巷IP形象生成侧面视图（90度），保持基础造型，应用与正面视图一致的蓝白配色和装饰花纹，展现3D卡通质感

operation_params.style_reference_description: 应用与正面视图（houthang-ip-blue-white-front-v1.png）完全一致的蓝白配色方案和装饰花纹风格。配色：主体为明亮的天蓝色，腹部和面部为纯白色，装饰有青花瓷风格的精致蓝色花纹。保持3D卡通风格的圆润造型、柔和光影和细腻质感。
operation_params.additional_prompt: A 90-degree side view of the cute blue and white cartoon character. The character is facing right, showing the complete side profile from head to toe. Apply the exact same blue and white color scheme as the front view: bright sky blue body with pure white belly and face areas. Maintain the delicate blue floral patterns inspired by Chinese porcelain design on the side surface. Show clear side silhouette including the ear contour and body proportions. The character should maintain the same 3D cartoon style with smooth, rounded forms and soft lighting. Background: pure white. High quality 3D rendering with consistent color palette and pattern style.

metadata.notes: 基于E5生成的基础造型，应用与正面视图一致的蓝白配色和花纹，生成侧面90度视角
